Translations.Text: Renmen zhong youren zai xinyang de bianyuan [huaiyi] shang chongbai an la, jiaru yi jian haoshi jianglin ta, ta jiu xinmanyizu [de chongbai an la]; jiaru yi jian zainan jianglin ta, ta jiu qingshuai de beipan [an la]. Ta shiqule jinshi he houshi. Zhe jiushi mingxian de sunshi.
Ta she an la er qiqiu dui ta ji wu hai ye wuyi de dongxi. Zhe jiushi ji shen de mi wu [zhu].
Ta qiqiu dui ta bi dayu li de dongxi. Ta de baohu zhe zhen elie! Ta de huoban zhen elie!
An la bi shi xinyang bing xingshan zhe jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. An la dique zuo suo yu zuo de.
Shei caixiang an la zai jinshi he houshi dou bu yuanzhu ta [mu sheng], shei dang xuanliang zijin, dang rang ta kan yi kan ta de jimou neng fou xiaochu ta de kuangnu.
Wo ruci jiang shi “gulanjing”[gei mu sheng], zuowei mingxian de jixiang. An la dique yindao suo yu yindao de.
Xinfeng yisilan jiao zhe, xinfeng youtaijiao zhe, sa bi jiaotu, jidu jiaotu [zhu], baihuojiao tu he duoshenjiao tu, fuhuo ri, an la bi wei tamen panjue. An la que shi jianzheng wanshi wanwu de.

Nandao ni mei kanjian ma? Tiandi jian de yiqie, ri yue xingchen, qun shan shumu, dongwu he xuduo ren dou koubai [fucong] an la, you xuduo ren ying shou chengfa. An la lingru shei, shei jiu bu shou zunjing [jue meiyou ren hui zunjing ta]. An la dique zuo suo yu zuo de. Koutou chu

zhe liang pai dishi zhe [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] huxiang zhenglun tamen de zhu [zhu]. Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe,[huo yu li shouxing de] huo yi yi wei tamen cai zhi hao, feishui jiang qingdao zai tamen de tou shang.
Tamen fu zhong de yiqie he pifu dou jiang bei feishui ronghua.
Tamen hai jiang zaoshou dai gou de tie bian de chouda.
Mei dang tamen xiang cong tongku zhong tao chu huo yu shi, tamen you bei gan hui huo yu qu [shouxing].[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen changshi shaozhuo de xingfa ba!”
